contentrichtext.text: In [[Greek mythology]], '''Aretus''' or '''Árêtos''' (Ἄρητος) was one of several characters: #King '''Aretus''' of [[Pylos]] was a son of [[Nestor (mythology)|Nestor]] and [[Eurydice of Pylos|Eurydice]] (or [[Anaxibia]]).<ref>[[Homer]], ''[[Odyssey]]'' III, 414</ref> #'''Aretus''' of [[Troy]] was one of fifty sons of [[Priam]]. He was killed by [[Automedon]].<ref>Homer, ''[[Iliad]]'', 17. 495-525</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} {{Characters in the Odyssey}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Aretus}} [[Category:Greek mythology]] [[Category:Characters in the Iliad]] [[Category:Characters in the Odyssey]] [[Category:Trojans]] [[Category:People of the Trojan War]] [[Category:Mythological kings]] [[Category:Neleides]] {{Greek-myth-stub}}
